result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Heber Benitez-Bernal. Defendant Heber Benitez-Bernal in court with Spanish interpreter Reme Bashi. Clerk. M.Burke. DE is in WCS non compliance. If the court is notified that the DE misses one more appointment with WCS the court will increase bond.
Status conference scheduled for January 4, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment and pay the remaining balance on the client service fee.
WCS Notice of Non-Compliance, specifically by failing to report to WCS as directed

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Xavier Solis in court for Heber Benitez-Bernal. Defendant Heber Benitez-Bernal in court. Clerk. M.Burke. State in victim rights compliance. Attorney Solis states he needs more time to discuss with the state and the DE.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment and pay the remaining balance on the client service fee.

NO RECORD MADE.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Solis and Spanish Interpreter Leo Martin.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Solis stated that they are working on a global offer. STC set to 09/21/22 at 10:30.
WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment and pay the remaining balance on the client service fee.
To Person Posting Bond

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License or a properly installed and operating IID if required.  Report to WCS immediately; Submit to random UA's upon request.  Comply w/ all program requirements & provide all required information.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Douglas S.  **DE MUST POST BOND BY 4PM on 07/22/22  OR DE MUST REPORT TO KENOSHA COUNTY SHERIFF TO BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY**
With Cassidy in records

Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Solis.   Clerk. M.Burke. Court quashes warrant but bond remains forfeited. New cash bond of $500 is imposed; DE has until 07/22/22 at 4:00 to post it. STC set to 08/31/22 at 2:00.
With Attorney Solis a VA has been set to 07/15/22 at 10:30.
Warrant sent to JS
Bench Warrant KPD22023499
Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  No appearance by the Defendant.   Clerk. M.Burke. Court forfeits bond and issues $1,500 bench warrant.
Hearing on July 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Due to the WCS notice of non compliance and bond motion filed a HE has been set to 07/01/22 at 8:30.
to Increase Bond

No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Douglas S.  **DE MUST POST BOND BY 4PM TODAY OR DE MUST REPORT TO KENOSHA COUNTY SHERIFF TO BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY**

01:14 PM    Attorney Zachary Brost appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Xavier Solis. Spanish Interpreter Ruth Garcia appeared.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered. Warrant authorized yesterday vacated. Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 10:00 am. w/22CM442. $400  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). DE has until 4pm today to post bond or DE must report to Kenosha County Sheriff to be taken into custody. rb
